site.title: Pablo Maceda | Software Engineer in London, UK
site.description: I'm Pablo Maceda, Software Engineer offering 6 years of experience, with a solid background as back-end developer and a broad technical skill set
site.author: Pablo Maceda

skills.name: Server / Cloud
skills: AWS (Lambda, API Gateway, S3, CloudFront, Route 53)

experience.description:
Working in a multidisciplinary team across multiple products. I had the opportunity to expand my area of comfort and develop my cloud and front-end skills while working in a fully CI/CD environment, delivering code multiple times a day.
I focused my work on shaping the back-end architecture, making products simple, increasing automation and reducing costs.
During my time at Sainsbury's I have learned the benefits and tradeoffs of a serverless architecture and refined my testing skills including E2E testing.

Developed and supported the ecommerce platform with special focus on performance improvements and the implementation of new technologies to satisfy the business needs. Creation of several internal tools to monitor the platform and to ensure the healthy status of it. Coordinated the delivery of new technology implementations alongside the Sysadmin team. 
Starting as an intern, I had the opportunity to quickly grow professionally.
During my last period on Kooomo I led the SRE team as well as a project to modernise the monolithic platform codebase using Laravel.
